abstract: Verizon Wireless is to begin selling the iPad at its stores on Oct. 28, a sign that the company is growing closer to Apple.
snippet: Verizon Wireless is to begin selling the iPad at its stores on Oct. 28, a sign that the company is growing closer to Apple.
lead_paragraph: Apple said Thursday that Verizon Wireless would begin selling the iPad at its stores on Oct. 28.

headline.main: Verizon Wireless Is to Sell Apple iPads
headline.print_headline: Verizon Wireless Is to Sell Apple iPads
